channel.title: Trollbox circumvents censorship check
channel.description: #### What happened? Someone in my game got TB'd to saying one of those derogative f words (similar to the British slang for cigarette), and it didn't asterisk out the bad word. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? ******* should have appeared instead of the full word #### Steps to reproduce: Start up as a fool and make someone say the nasty word #### Comments:

item.title: Trollbox circumvents censorship check
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Definitely sounds like a bug. I imagine TB is intended to follow all normal chat laws.

Read full topic

item.title: Trollbox circumvents censorship check
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
At first, you should report that fool.

And I agree, it should censor it.

Read full topic

item.title: Trollbox circumvents censorship check
item.dc:creator: RECONLESS
item.description:
What happened?

Someone in my game got TB’d to saying one of those derogative f words (similar to the British slang for cigarette), and it didn’t asterisk out the bad word.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

******* should have appeared instead of the full word

Steps to reproduce:

Start up as a fool and make someone say the nasty word

Comments:

Read full topic
